title: Bug 2120 - MRU File List not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
OB: The files in the MRU (Most Recently Used) list do not appear in the File menu.
EB: The files in the MRU list should be persisted between sessions and appear in the File menu.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Open several files.
3. Close the application.
4. Reopen the application.
5. Check if the files that were previously opened appear in the MRU list in the File menu.
